data.name: World of Music Interactive Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the World of Music! Use the number keys on your keyboard to play over 50 instruments hidden throughout the World. Solve musical puzzles with your ears! The World of Music Interactive Simulator is a 2D side-scrolling, open-world, ear training musical sandbox - and a companion to the World of Music YouTube series by the Brothers Bourque.

Features:
- Find, collect, and freely play 50+ instruments
- Use the 1-8 keys on your keyboard to play notes of the major scale
- Train your ears by solving musical puzzles, unlocking new abilities and instruments
- Explore 8 different zones across the World, with more on the way

data.short_description: Find and collect over 50 fully-playable musical instruments scattered throughout the World of Music! Use your ears to solve puzzles and clamber to places heretofore undiscovered in this musical platformer from the creators of the World of Music YouTube series.
